subtitleNullable: Analyze Sleep Pattern Data to visualize optimal sleep time of an individual
descriptionNullable:
This is a dataset containing the sleep pattern of an individual. Download and access more than 50 days of sleep pattern data through which you can answer questions & perform analysis like:
1. What is the average sleep time?
2. How many days have I slept for less than 7-8 hours?
3. How long was my day from the time of wake till the time of sleep?
4. Also, calculate the optimal value for errors induced in between as I forgot to record the data.
5. And many more..... 

Please note; this is all **primary & original data** I've been collecting using a self-built app.

## Suggestions on how to improve this dataset are welcome!! 😄
